name: sandrokeil/code-generator
description: Zend Framework 2 (ZF2) code generator which generates form and input filter depending on database or doctrine 2 meta data.

suggest.doctrine/orm: Doctrine\ORM if you want to generate classes from doctrine 2
suggest.symfony/console: Symfony\Console if you want to generate classes from doctrine 2
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: Zend\Db if you want to generate classes from zend framework 2 db
suggest.zendframework/zend-modulemanager: Zend\ModuleManager to use default module configuration e.g. services
